Nach dem logen des Cache, bitte auf dem Hauptweg 100 Meter bergauf zu PlÃ¤nkners Aussicht gehen und die schÃ¶ne Aussicht geniessen.Planckers view- the Big Point of ThuringiaIt is the highest caches in the middle of Thuringia.You can park your car on two parkking places in the near of caches ( distance two kilometres).You need following walking equipment:- binoculars- a camera whose zoom is very goodParking place west: N50 39.983 E10 44.241Parking place east: N50 39.353 E10 45.878In the box of caches you can find information in germany about this region.Good luckDerÂ© Sereco, Opencaching.de, CC BY-NC-ND, Stand: 24.04.2018;alle LogeintrÃ¤ge Â© jeweiliger Autor
